channel.title: I need help with special attacks and dragon claws
channel.description: i already have a client Version one out and i want to make a version two to go with some updates and to make version two i want to add d claws and statuis and stuff but i dont have there codes to add to my class 8 file and also when i had them i didnt know how to add special attacks or fix how they attack (it looked like i was throwing them or punching) could anyone get me the codes and teach me how to add a four hit specail and 1 hit specials for those please? it would be a big help
